sub_title: ACCA | Atrium European Real Estate | ex-PwC
summary: Highly motivated, ACCA qualified finance professional with more than ten years experience in providing and managing audit services under International accounting standards within a wide range of industries stepped out to the corporate finance, controlling role with knowledge in compliance (including iSOX), consolidated reporting, financial analysis, budgeting and automation. Adaptable team leader with an ability to work independently.
